articleContent:
Familiar scenes now lie faded, stripped of the colors they once held. A picture book awaits your touch to bring its hues back to life.

✦Duration✦
2025-08-07 04:00 - 2025-08-25 03:59 (server time)

✦Rewards✦
Astrite x400, Premium Resonance Potion x12, Premium Energy Core x8, Premium Sealed Tube x8, Forgery Advanced Supply x21, Advanced Enclosure Tank x42, Shell Credit x560000, and other Materials.

✦Eligibility✦
Reach Union Level 14 and complete Chapter II Prologue to unlock.

✦Event Rules✦
A new set of stages unlocks each day in this event, each offering three levels of difficulty: Easy, Normal, and Difficult. Complete a stage to earn rewards. Levels of higher difficulties will unlock once the previous ones are cleared. Solve the puzzle of colors to claim your rewards!
